desc: Garth Bayley Artist with works in Oils, Pen and Ink, Watercolour and Pastels. I paint sports, cycling, landscape, people, buildings and dancers.

layout.text:
Garth Bayley Artist working in Oils, Pen and Ink, Watercolour and Pastels. Unique artwork featuring Cycling, Horses, Cows, Dance and Landscape
Yorkshire and the North East
